Introduction
This topic contains general information on clinical records including
when clinical records are retired
how clinical records are retired
locating clinical records
when to request clinical records from the National Personnel Records Center (NPRC)
how to request clinical records from
NPRC
, and
a military treatment facility (MTF)
, and
clinical records destroyed in the fire at NPRC
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - Clinical Records and Personnel Records
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
